name: Farmageddon (itch) (PAI Group)
description:
Farmageddon is a game made during a GameJam our team attended.

Get immersed in this fast paced game! Shoot the buildings to stop them from spreading and protect your farm.

Programmer: Abel Varalungović

3d models: Petra Stojičić

Level design and UI: Inja Grgac and Ivana Jesih Kamber
